results.title: Reduction of spinal cord ischemia/reperfusion injury with simvastatin in rats.
results.text_hl: We hypothesized that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, a drug recently shown to be neuroprotective against @DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@brain ischemia@@@/@DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@reperfusion@@@, would be neuroprotective in a @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Spinal_Cord_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020760 @@@spinal cord ischemia@@@/@DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@reperfusion@@@ model.

citations.NLM: Saito T, Tsuchida M, Umehara S, Kohno T, Yamamoto H, Hayashi J. Reduction of spinal cord ischemia/reperfusion injury with simvastatin in rats. Anesth Analg. 2011 Sep;113(3):565-71. PMID: 21680858
citations.BibTeX: @article{21680858, title={Reduction of spinal cord ischemia/reperfusion injury with simvastatin in rats.}, author={Saito T and Tsuchida M and Umehara S and Kohno T and Yamamoto H and Hayashi J}, journal={Anesth Analg}, volume={113}, number={3}, pages={565-71}}

results.title: The attenuation of neurological injury from the use of simvastatin after spinal cord ischemia-reperfusion injury in rats
results.text_hl: On the contrary, a few studies failed to observe the treatment efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ after cervical or thoracic @<m>DISEASE_Spinal_Cord_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020760 @@@spinal cord ischemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Ryu JH, Park JW, Hwang JY, Park SJ, Kim JH, Sohn HM, Han SH. The attenuation of neurological injury from the use of simvastatin after spinal cord ischemia-reperfusion injury in rats BMC Anesthesiol. 2018 Mar 27;18(1):31. PMID: 29587636
citations.BibTeX: @article{29587636, title={The attenuation of neurological injury from the use of simvastatin after spinal cord ischemia-reperfusion injury in rats}, author={Ryu JH and Park JW and Hwang JY and Park SJ and Kim JH and Sohn HM and Han SH}, journal={BMC Anesthesiol}, volume={18}, number={1}, pages={31}}

results.title: Effect of pretreatment with simvastatin on spinal cord ischemia-reperfusion injury in rats.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Spinal_Cord_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020760 @@@Spinal cord ischemia@@@ was induced using a balloon-tipped catheter placed in the proximal descending aorta in the control and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ groups, but not in the sham group (n = 15).

citations.NLM: Hwang J, Han JI, Han S. Effect of pretreatment with simvastatin on spinal cord ischemia-reperfusion injury in rats. J Cardiothorac Vasc Anesth. 2013 Feb;27(1):79-85. PMID: 22445180
citations.BibTeX: @article{22445180, title={Effect of pretreatment with simvastatin on spinal cord ischemia-reperfusion injury in rats.}, author={Hwang J and Han JI and Han S}, journal={J Cardiothorac Vasc Anesth}, volume={27}, number={1}, pages={79-85}}
